column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My expectations were met! The deep dish pizza  was amazing!  I was also carded for beer and I'm in my 40's. Too funny.  Mind you
column2: its only beer and wine so enjoy some cold beer and expect to be plugged as the portions are extreme.  This place is 90% tourists so you don't have to worry about fitting in.  The average wait is tolerable because you pre order the pizza and by the time you are seated
